Text.Value: *The longer you stare at the dark and decimated words, the more your head aches. There is no meaning to be found here.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Barbarian player thumps the lock with a fist. There's a metallic crack as the lock mechanisms break.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KB][GUS-187855] A loud thump from the impact of the player hitting the book, followed by a short series of clicks and clacks, opening the lock.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Read cover idle][Search book and tamper (Success)][Book Opens]

Text.Value: Channel your patron's strength into the lock.
Muster your will and channel a surge of magic through the lock.
*As the lock opens, weak magic pulses from the book. Such a waste, binding it to dry, dead parchment.*
*As the lock opens, a loose page comes with it. Magic pulses from the parchment.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The character takes the book that was already open.

Text.Value: *The impact reverberates through your body, as if you just slammed a hammer into solid adamantine. The lock doesn't budge.*
Drown in fury - SHATTER THE LOCK.
The lock is begging to be smashed. Oblige it.
*This book is far lighter than it should be with such a massive lock.*
*The tome does not take kindly to your tampering. A feeling like pins and needles lingers under your skin, pricking and prodding.*
*Despite all your efforts, the lock cannot be opened, and does not respond further.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Take book from pack][Read Cover Idle][Return book to pack]

EditorData.SFXTags: [KB][GUS-187855] A loud thump from the impact of the player hitting the book

Text.Value: *The book remains open, exposing its annihilated text for all to see.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Take book from pack][Open Book][Read Idle][Close Book][Return Book to pack]

Text.Value: Leave.
Knock the lock open with a spell.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Barbarian player thumps the lockwith a fist ineffectively
EditorData.SFXTags: [KB][GUS-187855] A loud thump from the impact of the player hitting the book

Text.Value: *The last three names in this book sit close together, but are so devastated by the scrawl as to be unreadable.*
Channel a spark of divine power into the lock.
Channel the magic spark of your oath through the lock.
*What was once script is now an obliterated scrawl. You have a sense these are names, a list, but of what?*
*As the lock opens, weak magic pulses from the book. Such a waste, binding it to dry, dead parchment.*
*As the lock opens, a loose page comes with it. Magic pulses from the parchment.*

EditorData.SFXTags: Lock loosening, book opening, page flicks, magic pulse

Text.Value: Search for an arcane rune to sabotage.
*The book remains stubbornly shut.*
Examine the book more closely.
*Entire pantheons have dwindled and been reborn, silently recorded by this book.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Read Book Idle][Put book back in pack]

Text.Value: *Gods. These are the names of gods, once lost, but now restored after the Second Sundering.*

EditorData.SFXTags: [KB][GUS-187855] A loud thump from the impact of the player hitting the book, followed by a short series of clicks and clacks, opening the lock.

Text.Value: Leave.
Smash the lock open.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: For non-barbarians. See N100 for barbarian version

Synopsis:
The Book of Restored Gods is a record belonging to the death god Jergal, containing the list of fallen and resurrected gods across the Forgotten Realms.

CINEMATICS/MOCAP: The various methods of opening this book do not need to be shown on screen. There can be a close-up of the character focusing or a closeup on the book itself when it opens.
